lead_paragraph: Defending Olympic champion and high hurdles world record holder Aries Merritt says he will not skip the Rio Games if he makes the U.S. team even though the Zika virus poses a greater risk to the kidney transplant recipient than other competitors.

headline.print_headline: Kidney Transplant Recipient Eyes Rio Despite Zika Risk
headline.main: Kidney Transplant Recipient Eyes Rio Despite Zika Risk

snippet: Defending Olympic champion and high hurdles world record holder Aries Merritt says he will not skip the Rio Games if he makes the U.S. team even though the Zika virus poses a greater risk to the kidney transplant recipient than other competitors....
